thread.title: Talking whiskey with Rob Cassell - Philly.com
thread.title_full: Talking whiskey with Rob Cassell - Philly.com - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Philly.com
title: Talking whiskey with Rob Cassell - Philly.com
text:
Any well-informed martini drinker in Philadelphia should know that Robert Cassell is the guy who created Bluecoat Gin and helped launch this city's star as a center for craft distilling. But since leaving Philadelphia Distilling in 2013, where as founder and master distiller he also helped create Vieux Carr, Shine, and Penn 1681, Cassell has been shaking a hectic cocktail of other projects to improve the state of drinking far and wide.
 Philly.com.
